name: Military Wing
description:
Constructs the Military Wing.
Spawns the following units upon completion:
• 2 Spearmen & 2 Archers (Feudal Age)
• 2 Camel Riders (Castle Age)
• 3 Handcannoneers (Imperial Age)
The following military technologies become available:
• Boot Camp (Feudal Age)
• Composite Bows (Castle Age)
• Camel Support (Imperial Age)
